challenger.comment: Hash of Agent who initiated the challenger.

challengee.comment: Hash of Agent who receives the challenge.
challengee.constraints: Must be an Agent Hash different from Challenger (Source).

timestamp.comment: Might be removed in the future by entry-header's timestamp.

challengerPlaysWhite.comment: If TRUE Challenger will play as White.

isGamePublic.comment: If TRUE the game's Moves will be published on the DHT, otherwise will only be on each player's source chains.
